/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall and imposing, their facades adorned with ornate details that hint at the rich architectural heritage of the city. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along it, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sun shines brightly in the blue sky, casting a warm glow on the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
